title: The Smoking Gun Sisterhood
description: Note: This edition is out-of-print, and has a superseded, uncorrected text.Collection of 10 crime fiction stories, featuring women as gun-toting action protagonists. The treatment of these heroines is admiring and respectful. Stories included are: "Biker Angel," "Cops and Robbers," "The Falcon of Bitmesh," "The Capta and the Cop," "The Capta and the Cop, Part II," "Lights Out," "Sisters, Dark and Light," "An Afternoon at the Beach," "'Tis the Season," and "New Day at the Office."
author: Thad Brown
